name: Polycrab
description:
The plot of the game is set in Outerspace in the different timelines of planet Geonext was destroyed in past.  the half population dies on the planet because of P.O.L.Y.C.R.A.B life has become hel to people. so to stop nexus events on the planet __________ organization is doing an experiment on the old brain of the robot that somehow survives in V.E.N.E.L.A. this is the last chance to change the nexus event in the past _________________they are only oneway to read minds of a robot finally we get one solution that is very dangerous work_______________therefore we should go in past and change nexus event but____________ we have less time and we stuck here again therefore for run fast as you can

watch this for more information
